pages.title: Ronin Armor Set
pages.text: This set of Armor can be obtained via a chance to drop from the Ronin Skeleton- A rarer variant of skeleton that carries a Shotogatana

pages.title: Arbiters Outfit
pages.text: The Arbiters Outfit, once belonging to a Courageous hero can be crafted... However ->

pages.title: Mysterious Cloth
pages.text: In order to craft this outfit you'll need to find Mysterious Cloth, which can be found in dungeon and village chests at a rare chance
